message.body: So we meet again :)
hello again
Are you male or female?
Mal
I'm female... What are you hoping to do now that college is done?
Like what kind of work?
Well so far only adjuncting is available to me. id like to do something else but im not sure what that is
Hmm.. What did you major in?
Poetry!
Whoops
Huh?
Maybe not a practical thing to study i mean
Oh.. Maybe not. Not too many places hiring poets. When I was in college I majored in English but took creative writing, poetry, playwriting, prose writing...
I almost went to art school to major in ceramics.. Just didn't know what I'd do with that...
I've been thinking about going back and trying to get a degree in either graphic design or web development... I don't know..
Yeah learning java would probably be a good idea. i like teaching but adjuncting is really the bottom rung &there's no upward mobility
That sucks... Poetry is so subjective... I wasn't crazy about poetry class...
How old are you?
I have been doing absolutely nothing all day... What are you up to?
Reading and playing my keyboard. avoiding job applications. also submitted final grades for undergrads.
There's so much I should be doing... I'm just not motivated. I start physical therapy tomorrow night... Not looking forward to it... Gotta go to work extra early tomorrow so I can leave early for PT
